A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not into writing a long review ...but that was a long drawn out movie.  I was kinda bummed when I left the theater... I am just a tad nerdly and not a movie critic per se but how on earth did it get such high critic ratings??!? All I can think of is that enough money greased some palms... Hahaha\, when I got home I actually had to get back on RT to look again\, now I see I am not alone in my liking of this movie.
